com.ibasco.agql.protocols.valve.source.query.common.handlers

Class SourceQuerySplitPacketAssembler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • com.ibasco.agql.core.transport.handlers.MessageInboundHandler
          • com.ibasco.agql.protocols.valve.source.query.common.handlers.SourceQuerySplitPacketAssembler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler

    public class SourceQuerySplitPacketAssembler
extends MessageInboundHandler
    Re-assembles SourceQuerySplitPacket instances and converts it back to a single-type SourceQuerySinglePacket instance.
    Author:
    Rafael Luis Ibasco
